fields.title: The Delete button for repositories is placed rather unfortunately
fields.body: The Delete button for a repository is in a dangerous place, right next to the Save and Cancel buttons. I would like to suggest placing it somewhere where there is a smaller chance of hitting it by accident. Like on GitHub there is a separate section for that, making very clear to make sure the user really wants this.

comment.text: I consider this a non-issue as there is a confirmation prompt.
Fair enough. Would you still allow me to place it differently, when I get the time to so do, or would you rather keep it where it is?

Ok, we can put it on some sort of new tab. We'll have to dress it up to give it some mass - having a lone delete button would look peculiar.  And now that I look at it, I like the tabbed-part but I never restructured the repo header.  Yuck, looks terrrible. Well another thing to put on the list, I suppose.  ;)

As mentioned above, I did not want to load this off on you and I don't consider this urgent in any way.
I'm willing to try my hand at this myself. Which won't be any time soon, either. I wouldn't necessary see this as a separate tab, but at least as a separated section on an existing tab.
